title: Light Walkers
description: Anna thought the biggest problem in her new town was the gorgeous twins vying for her attention and an annoying cousin who is out of control. That was until she heard about the Light Walkers.Thousands of years ago Light Walkers roamed the earth in search of their mates, the Bright Ones. Now that all the Bright Ones are gone, the Walkers need to take their energy from the sun and an occasional human in order to survive.Anna didn't know it, but there were more then just humans living in her new town. Behind the pretty ocean side community is a darker side, one that threatens the lives of all the humans of Benwood Bay.
author: Patti Bricker
